fields.comment: if 1, PhysicsBody2Component will use this to figure out where the entity is located
fields.name: is_root

fields.comment: used to figure out which bodies are attached to each other when creating joints
fields.name: body_id

fields.comment: will try to find the SpriteComponent and use that
fields.name: use_sprite

fields.comment: tries to fit this into a circle, looks at bounding box of the pixels and sets the circle to the center of that with radius being the line from there to a straight edge
fields.name: is_circle

fields.comment: if this is true, moves offset to be in the center of the image, overwrites the offset_x, offset_y
fields.name: centered

fields.comment: the png file from which the body is created from
fields.name: image_file

fields.comment: the material from which the body is created
fields.name: material
